# mailinabox_dnsrecord (Data Source)

A DNS record on a Mail-in-a-box server

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "mailinabox_dnsrecord" "bare_a_record" {
  domain = "example.com"
  type   = "A"
}
```

### Required

- `type` (String)
